about.title: Explore the features of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} is an API that helps to compare pictures and documents in the same format. It can find differences in paragraphs, words, characters, shapes, and text styles between the compared documents. You can combine these changes and save them as a final document. It works well with PDFs, Word documents, Excel sheets, PowerPoint slides, Visio diagrams, Outlook emails, HTML, drawings, and various image typesâ€”all without needing extra tools.
